channel.title: Bloggggg - tmux
channel.description: We are fools whether we dance or not so we might as well dance

item.title: Dottmuxconf
item.description:
Tmux-Konfig mit grüner Statusleite und veränderten Keybinding.

unbind C-b
set -g prefix C-g
bind C-g send-prefix
bind g send-prefix

set-window-option -g window-status-current-bg red

# Set window notifications
setw -g monitor-activity on
set -g visual-activity on
setw -g automatic-rename

#emacs key bindings of course
set-window-option -g mode-keys emacs

set -g …
item.dc:creator: Christian Drexler
